{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R8900 |revision=-100NAS
(Nighthawk X10) |series=AD7000 |asin=B078BP613M |price=380 |est_release_date=08/16/2017 |fcc_date=06/23/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY316200339,PPD-QCA9008-SBD1,PY317400405 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Annapurna Labs |cpu1_model=Alpine AL-514 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML04G200TF100 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SFP+ |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1 |wi2_module_if=M.2 (1216) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9500 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=ad |wi2_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip2_model=QCA8337N |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=6 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, 2-port USB 3.0 PCIe Controller;ASMedia;ASM1024A;;1; ,,, 1x2 PCIe Packet Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, WiGig, DFS, VHT160, LACP, SFP+ (10GbE), |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ad |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=B0:B9:8A |oui_eth=B0:B9:8A }}
:• '''4620''' Mbps - 1SS 60GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wireless_Gigabit_Alliance#Single-carrier_and_Control-PHY_data_rates 802.11ad] (MCS12/16-QAM (3/4)), :• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''7000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X10 - AD7000 MU-MIMO Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :''802.11ac Quad-Stream Wave2 Wi-Fi plus 802.11ad'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R8900.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R8900}} A new FCC entry (PY317400405) suggests that Netgear has removed Bluetooth :circuitry and antenna in more recently manufactured devices. See the [https://fccid.io/PY317400405/Letter/Expedited-Review-Letter-3771555 Expedited Review letter]. Most of the information on this page was copied from the [[Netgear R9000]] since the FCC ID is the same.
This router appears to be a feature-limited R9000 [[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices|exclusively for Costco]] like the [[Netgear AC1450]] was.
The only obvious change from the R9000 to this R8900 is the lack of non-standard 256-QAM support :for 2.4GHz 802.11n which reduces the maximum theoretical speed from 800Mbps to 600 Mbps. *[https://www.costco.com/NETGEAR-Nighthawk-X10-AD7000-MU-MIMO-Smart-Wi-Fi-Router.product.100369511.html ''Netgear Nighthawk X10 AD7000 MU-MIMO Smart Wi-Fi Router'' on '''Costco'''] {{see also|Netgear R9000|Netgear|Annapurna Labs}} ===Product features=== *X10 is industry’s fasted router for media streaming with Plex media server. *X10 with 802.11ac/ad Wi-Fi technology delivers ultra-smooth 4K streaming, :VR gaming and instant downloads. *With a powerful 1.7GHz Quad-core processor, 60GHz 11ad, and Quad-stream :architecture, you can enjoy combined wireless speeds of up to 7 Gbps. *MU-MIMO supports simultaneous streaming, while 160 MHz doubles :WiFi speeds to mobile devices. *Four patent pending external active antennas amplify WiFi signals :to maximize range and throughput. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine [https://community.arm.com/processors/b/blog/posts/synology-s-ds2015xs-brings-arm-to-high-performance-nas-units AL-514] @1.7GHz :Quad Core ARM Cortex-A15 (see also AL5140) *Memory: 512MB Flash (NAND) and 1GB RAM (DDR3) *Tri-Band: 60GHz (4600Mbps), 5GHz (1733Mbps), 2.4GHz ''(600Mbps)'' :Supports 4x high-performance active antennas (like R8500) *WLAN: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[RFMD]] ([[Qorvo]]) RFPA5542 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*60GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9500 1x1 (AD4600) ::- [[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] module *Seven (7x GbE) 10/100/1000 Mbps ports: 1x WAN & 6x LAN :LACP - Dual Gigabit Ethernet Port Aggregation (LAN1+LAN2) :*Switch: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337N (4x GbE) *Ports: 2x USB 3.0, 1x SFP+ LAN 10GbE (10Gbps) port *Dimension:: [[Dimensions::316 mm x 264 mm x 61 mm]] (WxHxD) *Weight: [[Weight::1680 g]] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33046-netgear-r9000-nighthawk-x10-smart-wifi-router-reviewed ''NETGEAR R9000 Nighthawk X10 Smart WiFi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine AL314 (?) @1.7GHz (Quad-core ARM Cortex A15) :''ASMedia'' ASM1182e 1x2 PCIe packet switch, QCA Bluetooth LE radio, :''ASMedia'' ASM1024A 2 port USB 3.0 PCIe controller ===See also=== *[[List of 802.11ad Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] __NOTOC__
